getAll.description: Returns the details for the published version of each table defined in an account, including column definitions.

getAllDraft.description: Returns the details for each draft table defined in the specified account, including column definitions.

get.description: Returns the details for the published version of the specified table.

getDraft.description: Get the details for the draft version of a specific HubDB table.

create.description: Creates a new draft HubDB table given a JSON schema. The table name and label should be unique for each account.

delete.description: Archive (soft delete) an existing HubDB table. This archives both the published and draft versions.

exportDraftToCsv.description: Exports the draft version of a table to CSV format.

exportDraftToXlsx.description: Exports the draft version of a table to XLSX format.

exportToCsv.description: Exports the published version of a table to CSV format.

exportToXlsx.description: Exports the published version of a table to XLSX format.

importToDraft.description: Import the contents of a CSV file into an existing HubDB table.

publish.description: Publishes the table by copying the data and table schema changes from draft version to the published version, meaning any website pages using data from the table will be updated.

resetDraft.description: Replaces the data in the draft version of the table with values from the published version.

unpublish.description: Unpublishes the table, meaning any website pages using data from the table will not render any data.

getAllRows.description: Returns a set of rows in the published version of the specified table.

getAllRowsDraft.description: Returns rows in the draft version of the specified table. Row results can be filtered and sorted.

getRow.description: Get a single row by ID from a table's published version.

getRowDraft.description: Get a single row by ID from a table's draft version.

createRow.description: Add a new row to a HubDB table. New rows will be added to the draft version of the table.

updateRow.description: Sparse updates a single row in the table's draft version. All the column values need not be specified.

replaceRow.description: Replace a single row in the table's draft version.

deleteRow.description: Permanently deletes a row from a table's draft version.

cloneRow.description: Clones a single row in the draft version of the table.

batchReadRows.description: Returns rows in the published version of the specified table, given a set of row ids.

batchReadRowsDraft.description: Returns rows in the draft version of the specified table, given a set of row ids.

batchCloneRows.description: Clones rows in the draft version of the specified table, given a set of row ids.

batchCreateRows.description: Creates rows in the draft version of the specified table, given an array of row objects.

batchDeleteRows.description: Permanently deletes rows from the draft version of the table, given a set of row ids.

batchReplaceRows.description: Replaces multiple rows as a batch in the draft version of the table.

batchUpdateRows.description: Updates multiple rows as a batch in the draft version of the table.
